author: ztunel
body:
<!--
When using Test-Connection -Quite there is still output on the terminal
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```
Test-Connection $computername -Quiet
```
Expected behavior
-----------------

```
PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> Test-Connection $computername -Quiet
False

PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> Test-Connection $computername -Quiet
True
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```
PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> Test-Connection $computername -Quiet
Pinging xxx with 32 bytes of data:
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Ping complete.
False

PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> Test-Connection $compname -Quiet
Pinging xxx with 32 bytes of data:
Reply from xxx: bytes=32 time=156ms TTL=122
Reply from xxx: bytes=32 time=156ms TTL=122
Reply from xxx: bytes=32 time=159ms TTL=122
Reply from xxx: bytes=32 time=215ms TTL=122
Ping complete.
True
```
Environment data
----------------
```
$PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.1.0-preview.2
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.1.0-preview.2
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.16299
Platform                       Win32NT

```
